name: react-escape-html
description: ES6 tagged template string escaping HTML and producing a 'tainted string object' directly usable with React 'dangerouslySetInnerHTML' property
author: Manuel Vila <mvila@3base.com>

scripts.release: (git checkout --quiet master && test -z "$(git status --porcelain)" && npm version $npm_config_release_type && git push --follow-tags && npm publish) || echo "An error occurred (uncommitted changes?)"
